thread.title: Man jailed for 13 years for rape | Granada
thread.title_full: Man jailed for 13 years for rape | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Man jailed for 13 years for rape | Granada
text:
Credit: MEN Syndication A man has been jailed for raping, beating up, and plying a a woman with drugs when she was a teenager.
Shaun Freeman 56, of Great Howarth, Rochdale was sentenced to 13 years in prison at Manchester’s Minshull Street Crown Court.
A jury found him guilty of four counts of rape, three counts of sexual activity with a child, one count of supplying Class B drugs and one count of assault.
Last updated Fri 17 Feb 2017 Rochdale
